scripts.sync: git checkout main; git pull origin main; git fetch --prune
scripts.open: git checkout main; git pull origin main; git checkout -b feature/$npm_config_name
scripts.push: git add .; git commit -m "${npm_config_message:-push}"; git push origin feature/${npm_config_name}
scripts.close: git checkout main; git pull origin main; git fetch --prune; git branch -D feature/$npm_config_name
